Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 22/24 Queen Square is a 15,500 sq ft building with a stunning Georgian fa√ßade fronting entirely refurbished grade A office space. The property offers an exciting opportunity to work in one of the finest locations in the centre of Bristol. Excellent views over the square and the city's best amenities in very close proximity create the setting for one of the best working environments in the South West. High quality work space of 1,421 sq ft on the ground floor is available now.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Substantially Refurbished Office Space Available Summer 2019

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: ROYAL LONDON BUILDINGS_ BALDWIN STREET_ BRISTOL - FLOORPLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Royal London Buildings occupies a prominent position at the junction of Baldwin Street and Queen Charlotte Street, within walking distance of Temple Meads station and Cabot Circus, as well as the extensive choice of restaurants and pubs available in the Corn Street area. Royal London Buildings is an impressive refurbished office building, which provides accommodation on ground and 5 upper floors. The reception has been reconfigured with a waiting area and a communal meeting room. Common parts provide showers and refurbished WCs with secure bike storage in the basement.

Dynamic.PrimaryImage.Common.ImageCaption: ROYAL LONDON BUILDINGS_ BALDWIN STREET_ BRISTOL - MAIN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Great Western Court is an established and high-quality landscaped office park located in the Stoke Gifford area. The park itself is located just off Great Stoke Way which provides direct access to the M32 and junction 19 of the M4 via the new Stoke Gifford bypass and Filton Road. Bristol Parkway rail station is within close proximity and offers regular train services to London Paddington. Bristol city centre is approximately 5 miles to the south and is accessed via the M32.

Building 3110 is a detached 2-storey office building with double height main reception area. The accommodation comprises the ground and first floor available on a new effectively full repairing and insuring lease by way of a service charge for a term to be agreed.¬†Rent is available upon request.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Office Suites To Let In Established Office Park
